page.title: 05SHOPPING IN IXWORTH
page.content: Everyone questioned who lived in Ixworth said that they used the local shops. 79% used the Post Office regularly 17% used the Newsagents regularly 46% used the 'Spar' Grocer regularly 12% used the Greengrocer regularly *************************************** 14% used the shops every day 7% used the shops three times a week 25% used the shops twice a week 7% used the shops once a week 53% used the shops occasionally *************************************** Only 7% of people did their main shopping in Ixworth. 86% did their main shopping in Bury St.Edmunds. 7% shopped elswhere. *************************************** The two main reasons for not shopping in the village were higher prices and lack of choice.
